channel.title: Simple client request
channel.description:
I just would like a client that I could edit a configuration file and change the default IP, to be unsigned, and a custom picture, doesn't need flames(if possible).
I'm not a good, if at all Java coder, But this is for a server of my friend's darknessscape.no-ip.org, I don't know if I am asking for too much, but it would really help everybody searching for something like this, you may put your name in text on the bottom right corner if you wish for your credit.

item.title: Simple client request
